Package com.pdfjet

Class TextLine

java.lang.Object
com.pdfjet.TextLine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable
public class TextLine extends Object implements Drawable
Used to create text line objects.

    • drawOn

      public float[] drawOn(Page page) throws Exception
      Draws this text line on the specified page.
      Specified by:
      drawOn in interface Drawable
      Parameters:
      page - the page to draw this text line on.
      Returns:
      float[] with the coordinates of the bottom right corner.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an input or output exception occurred
